page.title: 18GAMES CHILDREN PLAY. CONT.
page.content: {BLACK CAT} This is a game where somebody is "he" and you have to sneak up on them. If the person who is "he"turns round and sees you, then you have to go back to the start. When you get up to the finish, the person who is "he" tells a story and when they get to the words "Black Cat" all the pkayers have to run back to the start before they are caught. {RED LETTER One person is "he"and first of all they choose one letter to be the red letter. During the game the person who is "he" calls out lots of letters in turn and if that letteris in your name you move forward one step. If the "red letter" is called and someone moves they have to go back to the start. The winner is the first person to reach the front.
